title: Gali͡ugaĭ
description: A Bronze Age settlement with burial mounds outside it, located in the modern the Terek River in Russia's Stavropol Krai. Scholars interpret this site as one of several defining the "Maykop culture", which flourished during the fourth millennium BCE in the western Caucasus.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Gali͡ugaĭ after Korenevskii 1995.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Gali͡ugaĭ
